translation.transl_bycreatinganaccount: By creating an account for our webshop you are able to go trough the paymentprocess faster and this enables you to track the status of your orders.
translation.transl_signuporcreate: Sign up or create an account
translation.transl_alreadyhaveanaccount: Already have an account? Then you can sign in below
translation.transl_fillbelow: Please fill in your e-mailaddress below and we will send you a new password.
translation.transl_loginagain: Back to the sign in form
translation.transl_notinourdb: The provided e-mailaddress is not in our database.
translation.transl_sendbyemail: Your new password has been send to you trough e-mail
translation.transl_please_provide_valid: The provided email / password combination could not be found in our database, please try again.
